content.rendered:
Meet Isabelle, a former Intern who describes her journey from studying biomedical engineering at Trinity College, Dublin to now working full-time as an IT Analyst at Millennium.

Learn more about our internship program.

excerpt.rendered: Meet Isabelle, a former Intern who describes her journey from studying biomedical engineering at Trinity College, Dublin to now working full-time as an IT Analyst at Millennium.
